column4: I'm trying out ubuntu - mainly because I got tired of Debian lagging (i.e. Xorg, ...), but now I'm trying to install "gcompris", but ubuntu lags Debian unstable - is there a "unstable" repository?
you could try adding the debian repos
apt-pinning works the same as apt-pinning in Debian, I think
so does "-t unstable" pull it from breezy or do I do "-t breezy" ?
